"Add Abilities To Items!":
"ARKS these days are so reckless! They're
not adding special abilities on their
armor. Such neglect can only be out of
ignorance. OK, listen up! You can add
special abilities to your weapons and
armor! The right special abilities can turn
the tide in battle! You'll thank me when
you see your efficiency soar. Personally,
my favorite special ability is..."
"Add special abilities to a weapon or unit."
